section.title: Introducing Castle
section.p: Castle aspires to simplify the development of enterprise and web applications. Offering a set of tools (working together or independently) and integration with other open source projects, Castle helps you get more done with less code.
We're a growing and exciting community, committed to provide good code and through our projects, allow you to focus more on the problem at hand than all technology specific boilerplate code.

ul.li:
ActiveRecord: The enterprise data mapping pattern implemented using [[NHibernate]]
ActiveRecord Generator: A desktop application to generate ActiveRecord classes based on database schemas
MicroKernel: A lightweight inversion of control container core

Windsor Container: Augments the MicroKernel with features demanded by most enterprise projects
Facilities: Packaged extension units for the MicroKernel
Components: A small library of reusable components
Services: enterprise services
DynamicProxy: A lightweight proxy generator for interfaces and concrete classes used by several .net open source projects
Castle Contrib: A reunion for contributions that augments our projects
NVelocity: A fork from the official port with several bug fixes and improvements
Castle Anakia: An improved port of Apache Anakia
Castle SVN hooks: Internal tool used to ensure certain standards on source files per commit
